casebody.data:
Second Department,

October, 1936.

(October 1, 1936.) In the Matter of the Appointment of Honorable Isaac M. Kapper as an Official Referee.

Honorable Isaac M. Kapper appointed, an official referee. Present — Lazansky, P. J., Young, Hagarty, Carswell, Davis, Johnston, Adel and Taylor, JJ.
